alert.note: Alert for Duplin; Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 3:29PM EDT until June 08 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Onslow County in eastern North Carolina... Southeastern Duplin County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 328 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Albert J Ellis Airport, or 9 miles west of Half Moon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New River Station, Half Moon, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, Camp Lejeune Center, Swansboro, Hubert, Richlands, Kellum, Cypress Creek, Midway Park, Verona, Catherine Lake, Albert J Ellis Airport, Richlands South, Deppe, Lyman and Haws Run. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
